title: Lemonade Change
statement: Customers queue to buy lemonade for $5. Each customer pays with $5, $10, or $20 bill. You start with no change. Determine if you can provide correct change to every customer.
input_format:
First line contains N.
Second line contains N integers (5, 10, or 20).
output_format: Print 'YES' if you can provide change to all, otherwise 'NO'.
